00003 <? get('theme')->include_header(); ?>

00005 <div id="content">
00006  <? /* Behold... THE LOOP! Look familiar? If you've ever themed Wordpress then it should :) */ ?>
00007  <? if(get('data')->are_categories()): while(get('data')->has_categories()): if(get('data')->are_forums()): ?>
00008   
00009   <div class="category_title">
00010    <h1><? get('data')->the_category('title'); ?></h1>
00011   </div>
00012   <table class="forum_list">
00013    <tr class="forum_list_head">
00014     <td class="forum_list_desc">Forum</td>
00015     <td class="forum_list_stats">Stats</td>
00016     <td class="forum_list_info">Information</td>
00017    </tr>
00018    
00019    <? $alt = false; while(get('data')->has_forums()): ?>
00020    <tr class="forum_list_item <? if($alt){ echo "alt_forum"; $alt = false; } else { $alt = true; } ?>">
00021     <td class="forum_list_desc">
00022      <h1><? get('data')->the_forum_link(); ?></h1>
00023      <p><? get('data')->the_forum('description'); ?></p>
00024     </td>
00025     <td class="forum_list_stats">
00026      <? get('data')->the_forum('threads'); ?> Threads<br />
00027      <? get('data')->the_forum('posts'); ?> Posts
00028     </td>
00029     <td class="forum_list_info">
00030      <? get('data')->the_forum('last_post_time'); ?><br />
00031      <span style="color:#000000">In:</span> <a href="<? get('data')->the_forum('last_thread_link'); ?>"><? get('data')->the_forum('last_thread_title'); ?></a>
00032     </td>
00033    </tr>
00034    <? endwhile; ?>
00035   </table>
00036  
00037  <? endif; endwhile; endif; ?>
00038  
00039 </div>

00041 <? get('theme')->include_footer(); ?>
